item.title: Martina McBride - Let It Snow, Let It Snow, Let It Snow
item.description:
Ukulele play along of Let It Snow as recorded by Martina McBride
A nice easy version using the original key of D.
Using the chords: D A A7 Em E7 D7
Strum Pattern: D DU D DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended - recording artist - Martina McBride
Note: try playing the D7 chord with your 2nd and 3rd fingers to make it easier for chord changes.
